asset.author: charbroil
asset.hookText:
http://www.charbroil.com.

The Char-Broil Big Easy 2-in-1 Electric Smoker Roaster
There's nothing else like this:
It smokes...
It roasts...
Chicken, turkey, corn on the cob, pork roasts...
It even fries turkey without the expense and mess of all that hot oil.
And all you have to do is plug it in, turn it on and select one of 15 power
settings that range from 125 to a whopping 525 degrees.
This versatile cooker delivers real smoke house flavor when you want it with
a front access smoke box for your favorite woods.
There's even a warming basket for cooking veggies, breads and more.
The Big Easy Electric Smoker Roaster has a built- in digital thermometer that
monitors the food temperature and automatically turns the cooker off once the target
temperature is reached. No more burned roasts or dry turkey.
The footprint is small to fit any patio and the cooking basket is big enough
for a 16-pound turkey or even two six- pound pork roasts.
With available accessories your cooking options are endless.
Check it out at http://www.charbroil.com.
